summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of both requirements. REQ-1 is fully addressed with ₹ symbol display across ProductCard, CartItem, Cart, and Checkout components. REQ-2 is implemented through backend migration, hardcoded default price in addProduct/updateProduct functions, and a disabled price field in ProductForm showing ₹20. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module (backend/migration.mo) that updates all existing product prices to 20
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to set the default/current product price to 20, not to migrate existing products. The migration.mo file implements a data migration that updates all existing products' prices, which was not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Disabled price input field in ProductForm component
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify that the price field should be disabled in the admin interface. While the backend hardcodes the price, making the UI field disabled goes beyond the stated requirement.
